title: Hisense A73F 164 cm (65 inch) Ultra HD (4K) LED Smart Android TV with 102W JBL 6 Speakers, Dolby Vision and Atmos  (65A73F)

product_specification.In The Box: Remote -1U, Manual - 2U, Table Stand - 1U, wall Mount - 1U, Batteries - 2U, Warranty Card - 1U
product_specification.Supported Video Formats: Dolby Vision, HDR, MEMC, AVI, MKV, TS, Blu_Ray, DVD_Video, MPEG, WAV, WMA
product_specification.Other Video Features: Dolby Vision HDR, MEMC, Ultra Vivid High Contrast Panel, HDR10, HLG, Ultra Dimming, UHD AI Upscaler, Game Mode, Precision Colour, Noise Reduction
product_specification.Sound Mode: Standard, Theater, Sports, Music, Speech, Late Night
product_specification.Supported App - Others: Prime Video, Zee5, Sony Liv, Eros Now, Jio Cinema, Voot, Sun NXT, Yupp Tv, MX Player TV, Hungama, Alt Balaji, ShemarooMe
product_specification.Content Providers: Netflix, YouTube, Google Play Movies and TV, Google Play Store, Prime Video, Disney+ Hotstar
product_specification.Other Internet Features: More Than 5000 Plus Apps and Games, Chromecast, Built-in Google Assistant
product_specification.Other Connectivity Features: Dual Band Wi-Fi, Ethernet LAN In, Bluetooth 5.0, AV In, Browser
product_specification.Other Convenience Features: Direct App Access Hotkeys, MEMC, Bluetooth Voice Remote, Dolby Vision, Dolby Atmos
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Warranty Does Not Cover Any External Accessories (Such as Battery, Cable, Carrying Bag), Damage Caused to the Product Due to Improper Installation by Customer, Normal Wear and Tear and Damages Caused to the Product by Accident, Lightening, Ingress of Water, Fire, Dropping or Excessive Shock, Any Damage Caused Due to Tampering of the Product by an Unauthorized Agent.
product_specification.Installation & Demo Details: Brand will contact for free installation. We'll facilitate the installation and demo through authorized service engineer at your convenience. The service engineer will unpack & install your new TV, either on wall mount or on table top. Installation and demo are provided free of cost. The engineer will also help you understand your new TV's features. The process generally covers: Wall-mounted or table-top installation, as requested.Physical check of all ports, including power and USB ports. Accessories also checked.Demonstration of features and settings Quick run-through on how to operate the TV. For Repair Services, authorized service engineer will do the following: Repair / change the defective part. Provide replacement to the customer in case part / product not repairable (only after replacement request approved). Warranty on replacement product will be applicable upto the warranty date of the replaced/original product.

product_description.Super Clarity Audio: Be it for watching movies and sports or listening to music, this Hisense TV comes with powerful 102 W speakers that deliver rich and high-fidelity audio, making every dialog, commentary, and beat feel realistic.
product_description.JBL Speakers: This TV comes with JBL speakers which take your listening experience to the next level. Every sound feels natural, making it a delight to listen to movie dialogs and songs.

review: Best picture quality , best sound quality, easy use , easy remote use , fast refresh , tv not hanging, fast moving, easy connected all device , google assistant work properly, bluetooth and wifi work properly. This is Best tv in 55 inch. In this price this is best picture and sound quality. 5 star👍

Best product in the price range below 50k.
Bought it after a 2 month long survey and not at all disappointed! Sound is awesomely loud and clear vocals. Decent Bass and beats along! The soundbar feel is proper. Picture Quality won't disappoint you. For those who are making negative comments, I advise them to make proper video and audio settings and then re-consider. For my case, the picture setting is DYNAMIC, audio is MUSIC and SHARPNESS settings to ZERO for all apps except Youtube whiere it is set to FIFTEEN. There is an option under Picture settings to improve viewing angles which should be turned ON as the first thing. Motion Enhancement to be set to STANDARD for watching movies. Having a VA Panel with Excellent Blacks, this display is very good if viewing from sides too, with that option ON. Go for it if your Room does not have direct Sunlight all day and if you prefer to watch TV mostly at night!

Wonderful smart TV in the price range. This can compete with the other smart TVs of top brands which costs around 70k+. Sound and picture quality is awesome. Worth the buy.

Update after 3 months of usage
Really wonderful, top quality. Even image and sound both are great. Go for it blind folded in this range one of the best option.

I have been using this product since Jan 2021.
- It has good sound and picture quality.
- If you are watching HD, Full HD and 4k Videos then it is a good choice.
- We can not expect SD videos clarity on any 4k tvs.
- Andriod version 9 is working fine. No lagging or delay while watching the TV.
- OTT platform contents are good. HotStar, Prime has lots of 4k contents.
- Youtube also has lots of 4k contents to enjoy in this tv.

Overall this product is worth for the money spend. I recommended for anyone looking for 4k TV in this price range.

I searched for a month than I preferred to purchase Hisense 55 inch with inbuilt JBL speaker. After one month of usage I can proudly say that it is really best and with all features I cannot get a better led than it.
Quality of picture is awasome.
JBL speaker Rock and supurb.
Connectivity 5 star. Within two to three second you can switch over to any app.i.e.prime video to youtube.
Price..Most economical with all its features, some one can go ahead with rate of approx forty five thousand.
For company... 4 and half star ⭐⭐⭐⭐✨
.. Half star I have given less because of one month usage. Else everything is fine...

Product is great .
but again flipkart cleared its reputation.
installation date was 20 October and installation done on 24 October. Totally unsatisfied from Flipkart service. Delivery boy behaviour was great and installation boy was also great behaviour and had good skills. but Flipkart is now changing their name to LateKart.

Have been a Sony/ Samsung user for decades now,.
Got this TV as a replacement for my dad's 49 inch Samsung and it has been a good decision to say the least.
All aspects of the TV are good and absolute value for money . The price doesn't hurt and the features are better than expected.
All in all I can say is that Hisense is doing a fantastic job in its products
Amazing excellent quality sound wise picture wise only one drawback wallotop stand and LED distance approx 5 inch ..approx 6 inch it out from wall .....

I purchased 55" Tv last month.... Tv remote not given by the seller but from hisense Mr. Prem Saxena spoke to me and arranged Tv remote. Thank u sir.
Tv picture quality is Good.
I like very much the Audio quality with 6 JBL Speakers. Value for money.
I will give 5* for Hisense...can purchase without any hesitation..... Very Good Quality Tv...

Quality of Picture is awesome..Value for Money..
You dont need any extra sound bar 102wt JBL sounds is too good. You can feel movie exp at your home..
All you need is unlimited High speed data pack to enjoy hd exp...
Very nice product..

Bought in dilemma but the user experience is awesome. It’s made us stunned with connectivity and smoothness. Overall product is really good and recommend to buy looking for power packed features package.
102W doesn’t feel really good, it’s average but still better than other TVs.

Excellent

Pro's:

Excellent picture Quality ( very Bright Panel )
Superb Buid quality
Sound is very good, it's very clean and clear even at 100% vol
Flipkart and the seller (Omni tech retail) support is very good

Con's:
It's not a con, it's a bug -

Every time we have to select the input while switching on, it's not taking the inputs automatically.

I hope in future updates it may resolve.

Thank you Flipkart/Hisense team for bringing this monster to the market

Make sure to have atleast HD set top box. SD channels are barely watchable. UHD upscaler doesn't help to upscale SD channels that much. The remote controller is made of ordinary plastics. Spacing of the buttons are poor. More often than not you end up hitting home button while scrolling the down button. Sound is clear & crisp. Bass is just okay. You cannot say it's 103 wattage output. I went for this TV for jbl speakers & it didn't meet my expectations. Unfortunately they are not as good as my 120 wattage boat sooundbar with a subwoofer. I would have gone for 30 wattage hisense A71F instead of this. I shelled out 10k more just for 102 watt jbl sound which is not justified. Both the tv's have almost similar features except for enhanced wattage in tornado. But I regret opting for tornado just for the sound which is not upto mark. I have 43 inch sony bravia 4k tv. I compared the 4k content of both side by side & iam surprised
by the display of hisense tornado. Watching 4k content is a delight in this one. It's really very good. The triluminus display of sony is tad better than hisense because of their extra colors & hisense tornado is not far behind. There is a huge price difference between the two. Android 9.0 is doing the job very well in hisense. It's blazing fast. I have tested all sort of USB pen drives & 1 TB WD hard disk. It works seamlessly. Much much faster than my sony tv which runs on outdated Android oreo. Jeeves did the job well in the installation department.

I was not sure before buying this TV but after watching and reading multiple reviews i decided to go for it and right now I'm totally satisfied with the picture and sound quality. This one of the best tv in this budget with 105 wat speakers. Just go for it!

The only thing that isn’t great about this TV is its SD to HD upscaling. There is a bit of lag, which may not be noticed if you are watching from a good distance. Otherwise, its the best device one can have at this price.

Excellent product, Worth for money,
1.Sound perfect even my hall is too big (20ft x 10ft) very very good
2.Picture Quality also very very good
Hisence product impressed me lot then why am giving 4 stare because installation and demo is bad...
My experience installation person was to bad..

I bought 2 product Hisence Tv 55" (A73F) & boAt Aavante Bar 3100D 260 W
Both installer came only one person.
Hisense, TV was amazing product, good clarity, sound was amazing to me, i really like that product but dont trust setup team is useless workers,

Best tv in this range... Connectivity is superb fast.. size is awesome... Up scaling is not so good.. all the apps won't be available on play store... Sound is thick but manageable... A perfect tv for a family

Amazing TV🔥 Worth the money
The picture quality is really good and the 102 W sound system is just amazing.
Setup and installation was really quick.
Must buy.
Delivery and installation by Flipkart needs a special mention. Well packed and delivered on time.

Picture quality in Dynamic Mode is so clear that you can feel every picture and read text very clearly.

Sound is like home theatre.

Connectivity work is so easy every child can do very easily.

Sound and Picture quality in Internet provided content is so awesome.

I feel a lack in this tv is SD channel provided by Set top are not seen very clearly . But TV can change HD channels content in near to 4K but not 4K.

Over All Best product in this price range.

I wants to provide 5 Star for this product and also flipkart to deliver on before committed time.

Installation process also do before committed time and using Corona Precautions.

Thanks You to Everyone.

Value for money. Really good picture quality. 4k experience is brilliant. 102W sound bar is like a thunder, you would not need any additional sound bar. Both bluetooth & WiFi connectivity is superb. Upscaling of SD channels is also above mark. Delivery and installation was done on same day for me. Overall good experience.

Considering this a budget TV, it offers a great value for money. Build quality is good and looks are premium.
No issue with connectivity or operations after 15 days of usage. Panel quality is good.
4k UHD picture quality is excellent. I have not used Dish or Cable but HD and SD content on OTT looks good. May need some tuning with Picture modes to best suite your likes.
Android UI is smooth.

Sound by JBL. Its very loud no doubt. But you wont find that signature quality of sound you expect from an Audio brand. Its good for general viewing and classical music. Don't expect it to give you extreme soundbar experience. Dolby Digital was disabled out of the box.

Hisense called to check for installation and feedback.

Overall pretty good TV experience for the budget.
It's really great experience I really tell you all tht instead of sony tv this is best option it's full pakage and great experience....

Thank you for the wonderful tv.. I believe i purchased valuable tv in quality&design wise sound wise, connectivity wise, especially i love the picture&sound quality is so amazing its gives theater feel at home... Hisense Tornado is the best option in 4k tv...

A brilliant LED that couldn't live upto my expectations in the sound department (maybe I was expecting more because I knew that it comes with a JBL soundbar). Don't get me wrong, the TV produces enough loud and rich sound to have a good experience, but if we talk about real immersive experience, it does leave you desiring more. Let me explain the narrative.

I bought this LED after some extensive research for 2-3 day and I'm thrilled with the final outcome. In the end, I was left with the two options:
1. Buy this LED with soundbar attached.
2. Buy Hisense A71F and pair it with a good home theater speaker setup.

Sure, there are some differences in both models but are very manageable except soundbar. I went with option 1 but I think I would have been better with option 2. Now sure it would have been 4-7k more expensive but I think it would have been worth it.

At the end, I don't want to take away anything from this TV as it is a delight to watch 4K content on. I'm not sure on the regular updates but I'm happy with my purchase.

At the time of purchaseing, Flipkart showed a warranty of 4 years. When I purchased the TV, in warranty card it was only for 1 year. Now Flipkart as well as Hisense also not giving us any written documentation about the warranty.

The sound of TV is not as much as I expected by 102 w speakers. I have to raise the volume up to 85 to feel the theatre effect.

Excellent Display with rich blacks. 5* for it.

Sound powered by JBL is not upto to the mark and the in built speakers doesn't support Atmos as checked with Netflix app. 3* for it.

Connectivity is good and without any hassle you can view with wifi. 5* for it.

When it comes to value for money, I feel a bit over priced to its own 55 inch series. 4* for it.

Huge problem I faced was installation which took 4 days for them to come do the installation.

ITS A WEEK OF PURCHASE...MY FEEDBACK IS

1. is PICTURE QUALITY GOOD? - YES AND NO, The conversion from HD to 4k is tiring to eyes... 4K content plays well without stutters... But fast moving images creates a difficulty to eyes

2. Sound quality - I dont know.. Sound is clear but i dont get that good sound feel... Its very mild... Iam not impressed since that is the Key selling point of TV,it did not meet expectations.... Better go for normal hisense and good sound bar...i willl. Need a Hisense expert probably to. Come and tune...

3.5Mhz and 2 Mhz - Wifi connectivity is good
4.Software is seamless so far as i use OTT apps and i dont have DTH
5.Installtion took 5 days and multiple social media escalations and follow up
6.The finish of product is premium
7.They have a pretty good call centre.. Where calls ar attended

Overall... I feel.. Should have gone for normal 4k hisense TV... Ans should have bought a Good sound bar... Probably would have bought their 58inch TV...
Product is of good quality but sound of tv is not clear & picture fast motion are not appropriate

The sound is very good as a sound expert.
The picture is pure 4k quality as it is SONY TV.
APPS ARE working too good.
Overall is fabulous

Bought the TV during republic day sale.
TV does not disappoint.
SW is fast and snappy, eventhough it is Android 9.
Strangely, some of the apps post installation does not show up, have to check out if it does to incompatibly or age restriction.
Picture quality is good especially 4k version or even 1080i from stb.
Sound is super awesome.
Hopefully longitivity of TV is good, since it is unknown brand.
Remote quality could be better, bundling of gamepad if given would be really nice.
Viewing angles being VA panel has its downsides.

I am sharing my experience after the usage of 2 weeks. Firstly Cons:

1. Hisense claiming that it has JBL sound bar. But sound quality is not as expected. But u can enhance by connecting additional sound system.

2. Motion control is not that promising while playing hd and hd ready content. U may feel picture lagging in normal scenes also. It is Ok with 4k content.

3. Pixel bleeding is there around the corners of the TV. however it is visible while watching tv in dark room. During lighting conditions it may not visible.

Coming to Pros:

1. Gives premium look and feel. It changed the look of my Hall

2. Os is not lagging at all and smooth too.

3. Picture quality is awesome while watching 4k content. All tv features in terms of picture quality are doing good with 4k content only.

4. Back light brightness is fair int this price segment. No other brand is providing 400 nits of brightness in this segment. It enhances picture quality.

5. There are more customisations are provided to enhance picture quality based on ur requirement.

6. Best value for money.

Best thing in this led is Price..
And sound quality is best.. at this price ..
Super vedio quality..

Android system is also very smooth work as mobile.. smoothly

The biggest challenge will come after delivery, no one from installation team is allocated for next 2 days from Flipkart team.
Hats off to HiSense OPS team, as they understand customer problem and try to resolve it. They have great customer prompt service.

TV is just great. After using 6 days I can say that it value for money. Picture quality is amazing, sound with JBL will give you great effects. Only if you want to see the picture from more than 130 degree angle than it can be bit low in colours. So not preferable for corners view. Otherwise best TV in this range.

Very good purchase at this rate.. super cool instalation got installed in the next day itself..

Pros

1. Very good picture quality
2. Super sound
3. Very good connectivity
4. Good viewing angle

Cons

Bass is low..

I was having super confusion which one too chose i have compared with all possible matches, iffalcon, thoshiba, vu, Kodak, hisense a71, one plus ..but i got very good reviews for this one and it's a world wide brand
Installation done & will share the feedback as early as possible. Overall happy with the product and excited as well to use the Smart Tv.

After using 2 + month I must say it's good deal under 40k. Right 55" under 40K 🙃🙃🙃.
Picture quality, sound and tv overall performance is more then good enough. Model is nice and attractive one.

As usual all other brands installation part suffer from third party installation. They are always seems to be in hurry. They just comes to unboxing the product not providing demo.
It's a must buy product even u have to pay 45-48k for 55'.

A Good product specially if you also use set top box and watch HD channels.Picture quality after upscaling is really good specially set top box point of view.It shines here were as others struggle when you play hd content through set top box on a 4k tv.
Sound is good when compared to other TV's but not as good as advertised for the premium paid here for the sound one can get a sound bar which would give better results and also be more flexible to use.

But as a single product it's still a good one.Extra warranty during some sales makes it a good reason to neglect the fact that it still runs Android 9.

In short a decent product.
Hisense 55A71F With a seperate sound bar would be a good option too

I searched one month multiple tv under 50k.but this tv served my purpose . I am writing this review after 5 month. Nice display performance and sound. Only thing I see is if you switch off tv and next day if u try to switch on , bluetooth remote pairing takes time .else tv is pakka and responding and streaming content well .go for it .

This review is after 1 week of usage:
1. Sound is awesome....I can easily hear audio from net content in 20-25 volume level....plus the sound modes let you choose a base heavy to clear vocals as per need
2. Picture quality is very good...contrast levels are excellant considering it's a VA panel
3. Installation guy always try to push their own wall mount but there is wall mount in the package...in my case installation was done promptly
4. I have really enjoyed you tube content, prime, hotstar content because of excellant picture and sound quality
5. No connectivity issues so far....wifi connection stays solid
6. Very good value for money considering I got my 55 inch tornado for 44k approx. With the sound bar
7. SD upscaling is decent
8. Memc is gud

Really loving this...may it could be just that I had 8 year old 32 inch tv (samsung) before.may be if you are coming of a newer tv to this one ...you may not notice such a difference
Kudos to flipkart for prompt service....

First of all design and Look is really premium and superb with almost no bezels and a sleek soundbar at the bottom with a ring LED

Picture quality is good and sound quality is very good, I felt if bass can be enhanced little more then it would have been excellent

Android is smooth like butter

Connectivity and remote is very good
Overall happy with the product, waiting for demo.
Value for money

Delivery boy was good he delivered led tv in good condition installation was done in time and man demonstrated all things with out most modesty .picture quality for SD channel is not good and view angle is also not good .picture quality for 4k videos is awesome and sound is enough and does not require any extra speaker.

Writing this after 1 week of Installation and use.. smooth as butter.. video quality is just awesome.. 4k content consuming is a bliss.. sound is great.. bass and treble are awesome.. 4k upscaling capability oft his tv is just mind blowing.. 720p content is running buttery smooth..

Being a va panel it doesn't have bleeding properties and while watching from angle its not fading the colours at all..

Note: picture is taken in bright sunny day.. may see some reflection for that..

Loved it totally...
Tv is good nice Clearite is good gorgeous ❤️

Over all good tv at this price range.. upscaling and smooth motion feature enhance the clear picture quality and blur free performance ..
Tv sound is better when compared other tv.

1)The picture quality is decent when you see the price range.
2)The audio quality is much better than any other TV in this range or perhaps in this category itself.
3) Connection is decent enough
4)The TV boots very quickly and the interface is also real smooth.
5)The remote is very very useful especially for the elders, and the Google assistant is quite responsive.

Amazing Tv with great pictures quality. Darker black and amazing colour. Sound is average. Bought this Tv specially for my PS5 Console and it’s work perfectly. No input lag awesome 4K gaming experience.

Overall good product :)

The tv is amazing. Atleast by the look. The wall mount protrudes a little from the wall. I feel this is one of the best buy in this range for the size. The other option would be philips 8125 along with motorola zx pro(ips) . I had not heard about this brand till the time I was researching on TV.
Quality of the remote and the UI is smooth, picture quality is good. I bought ir since it was offered with a sweet deal of 4 years warranty.

The installation on the other hand was a tedious task . Only 1 guy came and he was inexperienced.
It was a hassle convincing him and getting the wall mount on. I think he was trying to sell the extended wallmount which would cost 1.6k extra.
I actually dint need so went with in the box wall mount.

Need to wait for a few months and see how the tv fairs. As of now we are enjoying the tv
I am happy to hisense tv good picture good connect dual wifi and sound with JBL assom I love it

Tv is very good with superb picture , build and sound quality. However my review is based on 5 days usage.
Overall a good budget tv for those who don't have sound bar. If u have sound bar then go with a71 model no need to spend xtra on tornado
The tv delivers on all parameters as advertised. Connectivity is fast . JBL sound gives wholesome experience. Flipkart service is prompt. A great addition to any home!!

I given 4 star for sound Quality because Bass is zero in this tv vocals mids highs are excelent......But sound quality is far better than other TVs .....
But refresh rate is 60 if it is 120 this is the best tv in all aspects.......
But at this price range no tv have this properties.......

The best part is the picture quality which is bright, crystal clear and soothing. To get the exact effect, play 4K or 8K videos from YouTube. There is no difference comparing to other much popular TV models with huge price tag. Remember Hisesnse is also a TV panel maker and parts maker. VU is one of the client.

Great tv available in the market, display seems to be better than LG or Samsung Crystal series.
Flawless navigation and smooth, super fast boot time and great sound quality. Though bass could have been better, but overall nice product.

Positive - An ips panel would have been great but still, this tv delivers amazing picture quality with great sound.

Delivery & installation - received the item in good condition with fast installation time.

Cons - Remote app is no different than the android tv app and definitely needs a feature packed update

Pros: TV is the best in its segment in 55 inch TVs with all 4k Video (Dolby Vision, HDR 10, HDR 10+, HLG) and sound formats ( Dolby Digital, Dolby Atoms )supported. Best 4K panel (VA) available for the price.

Cons: Only issue with this one is attached sound bar has good sound reproduction but with a little or no bass quality. I will highly recommend to get a good Soundbar or Home Theatre speakers ( If you can afford it ). Can't get the lower model and soundbar since you will lose better speakers and mmc chip (which helps with better blacks and motion and subtitle blooming ). I will recommend Yamaha YAS 209 (The best ) or any Sony 5.1 or 2.1 soundbar if you are on a budget.

Outstanding Picture Quality
102 watt soundbar Superb Clearity
Connectivity is quickly not required Android 10 or 11.
Smooth motion And Ultra Dimming works Great
Best Package in this price range
Colour like A QLed Panel

Excellent product. I got five warranty also. So it is really value for money
Overall it is worth, just do not expect much from the JBL speakers l, they are ok for me. Picture quality, connectivity and support application are all good 4/5.

I booked 55 Inch Hisensre TV on 8th June and received on 9th June based on reviews shared by earlier buyers and are accurate as the TV meets the expectations and is good in picture, sound and connectivity quality. Thanks Flipkart and Installation Team.

Very sharp picture quality but sound not good & promise for continuous update time to time, I am sorry to say but there is no software update after 4 months & now there is no response by the team over watsapp or telephone.
Nice

Speaker is the main highlight of the TV. However, the audio is not clear to listen to dialogues. It amplifies background score and compromises on dialogue audio. Motion blur handling software is a gimmick. Watching cricket match isn't a good experience as the video gets distorted and tracking ball is difficult.

It met the expectation, happy with picture and sound quality. Inbuilt JBL is really awesome!!...Hardware quality is also good. It's first day feedback, hope TV runs for longer duration without any issues. Thank you.

Faced some issue with sound quality but after engineer visit , everything is ok. And the best thing about Hisense is the customer service. They called me and did the needful in very sort time. A:4K indicates no of horizontal pixels in the TV. The TV is 3840x2160p ie 3840 horizontal pixels and 2160 vertical pixels. 3840 when rounded off in 1000s is 4000. Hence commonly it is called as a 4K TV.
A:There is no memory card slot. However you can use a SD card to USB converter to plug it in USB slot & play your content
A:Ultra HD TV or UHD TV is terminology used for TV having 3840 or more horizontal pixels. Hence UHD TV can be 4K, 5K and even 8K TV are now available in market.
A:Dolby Vision is an advanced form of HDR (high dynamic range) inspired by cinema techonology. It performs scene by scene processing to bring out spectacular color, brightness, contrast and details
